en.title: QP Wearers, Indonesian Sports Champions, supports "Christmas For Payatas" Charity!
en.content: FE would like to thank QP Wearers, Indonesian World Class Sports Champions, Rudy Hartono, Susy Susanti, Candra Wijaja and Ade Rai, for supporting the global  "Christmas For Payatas" Charity of which FE is a major donor and sponsor.

meta.description: FusionExcel would like to thank Quantum Pendant Wearers, Indonesian World Class Sports Champions for supporting the global "Christmas For Payatas" Charity.
meta.keyword: Quantum Pendant Wearer, Christmas For Payatas, Rudy Hartono, Susy Susanti, Candra Wijaja, Ade Rai
meta.author: klhunter
